item.title: Sen. Bill Cassidy to Newsmax: Healthcare Customer Accounts 'Common Sense'
item.description: Empowering healthcare customers to seek the best insurance deals is common sense, Sen. Bill Cassidy, R-La., told Newsmax on Monday.
